description: This Java class defines a request for network change within a mock Zigbee core environment. It includes properties for channel, panId, and networkKey, and an execute method that sends a response and triggers a network change event.

classes.name: NetworkChangeRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to change network parameters in the mock Zigbee core environment.

methods.name: NetworkChangeRequest
methods.description: Constructor initializing request ID, channel, panId, and networkKey.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the network change by sending a response and invoking the networkChange method on the MockZigbeeCore singleton.
